title: ClickCart
description: A responsive e-commerce front-end app that displays products from JSON data and enables users to add items to a cart with localStorage support. Includes a contact form integrated with EmailJS for customer communication.

title: ConvertXpert
description: A professional currency converter web app that uses real-time exchange rates via API to convert between global currencies. Demonstrates API integration, dynamic UI, and efficient state management with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: To-Do List App
description: A React-based to-do list app allowing users to add, update, delete, and mark tasks as completed. Built with Tailwind CSS and Context API for state management, featuring a clean, responsive interface.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A front-end clone replicating Netflixâ€™s look and feel, focusing on clean UI/UX, responsive layouts, and user-friendly design to deliver an immersive streaming platform experience.

title: Weather App
description: A weather app that provides real-time data based on user location or city search, using the OpenWeather API. It dynamically updates the background and info to match current weather conditions for an engaging experience.

title: Amazon Clone
description: A front-end Amazon clone focusing on UI/UX design, responsive layouts, and user-friendly navigation to replicate a familiar e-commerce shopping experience.
